name: Vegan Sweet Potato Bread 1 Bowl
description: Vegan Sweet Potato Bread with Cranberries or other berries of choice. Easy 1 Bowl Loaf with winter spices. Use pumpkin for variation. Nutfree Soyfree Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1.75 cups  flour ((I use a mix of 3/4 cup wheat and 1 cup all purpose), See GF option in Notes below)
1/2 cup coconut sugar (, or other fine sugar, add 2 tbsp more for sweeter)
1 cup fresh cranberries or mixed berries
3/4  scant cup sweet potato puree ((I use canned puree), or use well mashed boiled or steamed sweet potato)
1 tsp lime juice or apple cider vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 365F (185°C). Line a loaf pan with baking paper and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 365F (185°C). Line a loaf pan with baking paper and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk 1.5 cups flour with the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Add berries and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk 1.5 cups flour with the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Add berries and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix vinegar into the non-dairy milk. then add it to the dry ingredients. Add sweet potato puree and oil and mix well to combine into a smooth batter. If the batter is too thin then add more flour a few tbsp at a time. (If you are baking muffins, you can keep the batter less stiff. For loafs or larger volume baking, you want the batter to be thicker, stiff with a more dry to moist ratio ad the sweet potato puree will leak moisture during baking.)**
recipeInstructions.name: Mix vinegar into the non-dairy milk. then add it to the dry ingredients. Add sweet potato puree and oil and mix well to combine into a smooth batter. If the batter is too thin then add more flour a few tbsp at a time. (If you are baking muffins, you can keep the batter less stiff. For loafs or larger volume baking, you want the batter to be thicker, stiff with a more dry to moist ratio ad the sweet potato puree will leak moisture during baking.)**

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the sweet potato bread dough into your prepared loaf pan. (Add a streusel if you like. )
recipeInstructions.name: Spoon the sweet potato bread dough into your prepared loaf pan. (Add a streusel if you like. )

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 365 deg F (185 C) for 55 to 60 mins. (25 mins for muffins). Check with a toothpick from the center. Cool for 10 mins then remove from pan and cool completely before slicing. Store on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a 5 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 365 deg F (185 C) for 55 to 60 mins. (25 mins for muffins). Check with a toothpick from the center. Cool for 10 mins then remove from pan and cool completely before slicing. Store on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto a 5 days.

keywords: sweet potato cake, sweet potato cranberry bread, sweet potato loaf, vegan sweet potato cake
